body: If the `DateRange#display` is to be renamed to `#to_s` (see other comment), I would return the `DateRange` instance here, not the string. It's just a minor thing, but to me having the method match a (snake_cased) Ruby class name and also semantically _meaning_ the same thing but returning a string is a bit confusing.
